en.command_dino_prof: 🥚 | You don't have any dinosaurs at the moment, please check your inventory. You should have an egg in your inventory that you can incubate!

faq.text: 🍿 | Hey, our bot is pretty big, and there's a lot of information. Here are a couple of categories, choose what information you want to get >
faq.general:
🎈 *Rarities*
Events and dinosaurs are divided into rarities.
The greater the rarity, the sweeter the reward.

 1. Regular - 50%
 2. Unusual - 25%
 3. Rare - 15%
 4. Mystical - 9%
 5. Legendary - 1%

🕹 *Interactions*
To interact with a dinosaur, go to `🕹 Actions`.

 1. In order to feed the dinosaur, you need to get food, click on `🕹 Actions` > `🍕 Gathering food` and follow the instructions.

 2. To feed the dinosaur, click on `🕹 Actions` > `🍣 Feed` and select the appropriate food.

 3. In `🎮 Entertainment`, you can choose a game and entertain the dinosaur to cheer it up.

 4. In `🎑 Journey` you can find different items, meet friends and see a lot of interesting things!

 5. `🌙 Put to bed` The dinosaur needs sleep every day, do not forget to put him to sleep!

🎮 *Profile*
 To view inventory or learn your stats, go to `👁‍🗨 Profile`

🔧 *Settings*
In the settings, you can rename the dinosaur, disable notifications, or switch the language.

🛒 *Market*
You can sell or buy the things you need on the market.

👥 *Friends*
You can manage your friends and referral system from your friends menu. The more friends, the more opportunities to get some bonuses. Also, by inviting a friend through the referral system, you and your friend will receive pleasant bonuses.

🦕 *Number of dinosaurs*
Every 20th level, the number of dinosaurs increases by 1.
20th level - 2 dinosaurs.
 40th level - 3 dinosaurs...
faq.eat:
🥙 *What does my dinosaur eat?*
Look at the profile of your dinosaur, dinosaurs live in their native environment.

Herbivores are herbivores, forest / jungle predators, and those who love fish fly in the clouds.

🍕 *Yummy*
🍯 A jar of honey, 🥞 Sweet pancakes - dinosaurs love goodies and regardless of their type, they will gladly eat them!

Also, this food gives bonuses to mood / health, etc.

You can find out all the information about the item in the inventory!
faq.accessories:
🏓 *Accessories*
Accessories open up additional opportunities or speed up activities. 
Accessories can be installed while the dinosaur does nothing by using it in the inventory.
Accessories can be found in travel or dungeons.

🎲 *Here are some of them...*
 🧸 Bear - allows you to select the sleep mode.
 🛠 Tools - speed up food collection.
faq.dungeon:
📜 *Quests*

In the tavern you can get a quest (just wait in it), quests give interesting bonuses for the most ordinary actions!

🗻 *Dungeons*
Embark on an exciting adventure with your friends! Adventures, bosses, unique items!
You only need 200 coins to get into the dungeon!
No initial equipment is needed, and your dinosaurs can't die in it.

🍺 *Dino Taverna*
Look in `‍🍺 Dino Taverna`, there you can learn information from visitors, find other players. And also get quests!

tavern_dialogs: They say scary monsters roam the dungeons...

I eat these for breakfast!

I won't go back there!
Are you afraid of going down into the dungeon?!

Yesterday I saw the Hero leaving the dungeon with a golden sword!
Do not tell fairy tales, there is no one terrible there!
Tell me how you lost your eye in this dungeon...
I'm not afraid! There are just no coins to enter...
What time will it be, the 21st? And you've taken a lot out of there already?
Yeah...

tavern_enter: When you enter the tavern, you feel a pleasant coolness and hear the sounds of creaking wooden furniture, the aroma of food and drinks makes you escape from hunger.
Turning into the tavern, you see a lot of tables filled with beer and freshly squeezed juices, as well as a crowded society that loudly and cheerfully rests after a long day.
At the entrance, you are greeted by bright lights and a warm atmosphere surrounding this place, crowded with tourists and locals, welcoming each new guest.
Walking inside, you see a huge bar full of various drinks and a noisy crowd clogging every corner of the tavern, which boils with life and tempting food.
Looking around, you notice a dark interior soaked in alcohol and smoking products, and a group of musicians playing on stage in the center of the hall reminds you of life on the road.

You enter a tiny tavern dotted with wooden barrels standing along the walls and floor tanks supporting an underground tank, while a bartender standing on the counter with a smile on his face prepares your favorite cocktail.

The surroundings of the tavern are immersed in measured calm, when you get inside, you notice the tranquility, conducive to a relaxed rest, and the walls are covered with an old picture and inscriptions extracted by guests, which creates a warm mood.

Entering a huge tavern, you will find several cozy areas where you can spend time with family and friends, the upper floor is surprised by the unique system of dynamic lighting, it makes the hall sing and dance peacefully merging into the unique roof of the building.

On this calm evening, full of the fragrance of delicious homemade food, you snap the door of the main hall of the tavern and a calm spiritual corner opens for you in the middle of a foggy tower, which fascinates with its depth and mystery.
Entering a small tavern, you see a cozy and attractive potion, where alternative music and fast food flavors play, creating a real carefree leisure.
When crossing the threshold of the tavern, you feel the warm magic and meet the wide bar counter, where happy guests are already watching what is happening.
Entering the tavern, you will immediately feel the atmosphere of friendliness, relaxation and enjoyment of the royal cuisine.
With a wry smile, you sit at a long table filled with food and drinks, where there is a large screen on which the games are shown.
Once inside, you immediately realize that it represents everything you'd expect from a tavern, where loud conversations, live music, and plentiful food rightfully come first.
Wrapped in the scents of an exquisite festive dinner, you look at juicy steaks and bottles of expensive wine, where shining glasses and outings make guests relax and enjoy the evening.
Inside the tavern, you will see a mounted bar counter, lively guests and fiery factories working, making the atmosphere even more fiery.

Having opened the door of the tavern, look at the faces of the smiling bartenders with three liters of cups, immediately creating a peaceful and soulful corner for rest and exercise for the whole week.
Surrounded by dark plasters, you can smell freshly baked bread and spices when the aromas fly into the nostrils of the guests, which creates a pleasant atmosphere.
Everything in the tavern, where live music is played, is imbued with the national flavor and liveliness of the locals, who offer a variety of drinks and snacks on the go.
Entering the hall, where the most interesting things happen, you find a comfortable place on the sofa, the music makes you sing and dance, generous with the mood for the guests.
With working lights and soft noise, the tavern attracts with its romance and deep aroma of food, and regulars are always ready to welcome a new guest.
On the cozy chairs inside, the quiet notes of the guitar resonate, creating comfort for those who want to sit in a cozy atmosphere after a hard day.
As soon as you enter the beautifully decorated hall, you will feel a warm welcome, in addition to the fragrant kitchen area with rich national dishes.

Under the ringing of cups and the refined color of bright canvases, the guests of the tavern are here to relax and get aesthetic pleasure from the praiseworthy curves of dancing, the smells of food and drinks.
Shrouded in fog and cloudiness, the tavern attracts with its cozy and soulful atmosphere, as well as with its addition of aesthetic nostalgia.
With the creak of wooden furniture and valuable items mounted on curved walls, you feel warm and cozy.
A pleasant atmosphere of friendliness and abundance lies in every corner of this tavern, where the music and hospitality of friendly bartenders will not leave you indifferent.
In the foggy hall decorated with confetti and green lanterns, guests relax in different areas, smoke hookahs and experience different national dishes.
The aromas of hard liquor, as well as hot fried food, reliably remind you of life in the key of carefree pleasure that is inherent in this tavern.
Opening the door of this tavern, the cozy atmosphere buys you warmth, lightness and optimistic comfort, providing relaxation and entertainment for guests.

Connecting with the sensations from the best days of your childhood, you are immediately rooted between pelicans, down jackets and join the cheerful bratva who frowned at life, smokes, socializes and drinks in the tavern company.
Relaxing, you feel the tranquility and brightness inside this tavern, where loud music, longing, hot food, as well as drinks, are in the first place.
At the entrance to the tavern, you are surrounded by abundance and hospitality, in which guests enjoy fried food, good music and a cheerful mood.
Entering a tavern lit by lamps, you will find a lively crowd screaming loudly and knocking bottles in gratitude to the hospitable bartenders and good cuisine.

start.text: ✉ You received a message from an unknown source.

m1.text: Greetings, darling{user_name}. We have received a message about the extermination of dinosaurs, do you confirm this information?

m2-n.answer: No, I don't know anything about that.

m2-y.text: Nice, give me your reputation ticket

m2-n.text: Yes? According to our data, this is exactly how it is.

m3-n.answer: It must be my twin brother...

m3-n.text: {people_name} looks at you with a smile. It's already clear, he knows you're lying.

m4-n.answer: Yes, yes, yes! My brother is a disgusting person!

m3-y.text: According to your reputation, we have an offer for you. Here, look at the contract.

m4-n.text: I see you don't want it for good... I like it, we need the daring ones in our business, here, sign it.

m4-y.text: 📃 After reading the contract, you found out that you give 80% of your savings and all the inventory of the organization, and in return, the organization allocates you an egg of uncertain rarity.

end-y.answer: I like it, I sign it.

m5-n.text: 📃 After reading the contract, you found out that you give 70% of your savings and all the inventory of the organization, and in return, the organization allocates you an egg of uncertain rarity.

end-n.answer: I like it, I sign it.

end-y.text: Great, nice doing business with you)

end-n.text: Great, nice doing business with you)

en.journey_complexity:
*🖼 | On the complexity of travel*

*🟢 Easy* - No risk and dangerous collisions, suitable for beginners. Events only affect the mood, the dinosaur will not be harmed.

*🟡 Average* - Dangerous situations can occur in such locations, but more neutral ones.

*🔴 Difficult* - There are many more dangerous events than neutral ones, you have to go here prepared.

_The greater the risk, the greater the reward_

without_influence: Walking through the beautiful forest, the dinosaur noticed the butterfly, glazing over it and did not notice how it became darker.
influences_health: Walking under the crowns of giant trees, the dinosaur saw grasses. He immediately remembered how at school they were told about Gulgamesh's grass. Applying it, the dinosaur felt healthier.
meeting_friend: Walking along the path to the meeting, I came out - {friend}! The dinosaurs were very happy to meet each other!
trade_item: Traveling through the forest, the dinosaur stumbled upon a wandering merchant, the merchant offered the dinosaur a couple of possible deals.
edit_location: Traveling through the forest, the dinosaur found a completely new road that he had not noticed before, he decided to go along it. Moving on, the environment began to change.

influences_mood: Walking along the path, the dinosaur saw a beautiful rainbow, the dinosaur immediately became warmer in his soul.
influences_eat: Walking along the path, the dinosaur noticed sweets that lead somewhere to the bushes. 1, 2, 3. The dinosaur is already near the bushes, but the dinosaur has already eaten enough and went on.
influences_game: The dinosaur jumped through the puddles after the fire.
influences_energy: The dinosaur took a nap in the clearing, now it's time to move on!
coins: Walking along the path and looking under the stone, the dinosaur found something golden and took it with him.
item: Passing by the tree, it seemed strange to the dinosaur that there were so many footprints around. After examining the area, the dinosaur found something interesting!
quest: Walking, the dinosaur met a sad dinosaur. He said he had lost his red hat. Your dinosaur immediately went in search. The dinosaur found the hat (even though it was green) and received the reward!

influences_mood: Walking, the dinosaur saw a felled tree, he was very upset because of this...
influences_eat: I am actively traveling, the dinosaur has gone cold.
influences_game: Walking through the monatonic forest, the dinosaur got bored, he wants to play.
influences_energy: Climbing under each stone, the dinosaur was very tired and sat down to rest.
coins: Going through the items found, the dinosaur considered the square coin to be a fake and threw it away.
item: A hole formed in the dinosaur's backpack, because of this the dinosaur could have lost something.
quest: Walking, the dinosaur saw a crying dinosaur, coming up, the dinosaur could not make out his words. After digging in your pockets, your dinosaur offered to eat the poor man, but he just left.

without_influence: Walking along the beach, the dinosaur renewed a beautiful shell.
influences_health: Resting on the beach, the dinosaur was able to relax under the sun.
meeting_friend: Looking at the waves, the dinosaur saw {friend} sunbathing near him.
trade_item: Walking along the beach, the dinosaur saw a crab with a large bag. The crab tells the dinosaur that he is a merchant and that he likes to buy and sell things.
edit_location: Walking close to the shore, the dinosaur did not notice the wave, it was swept by the water, and when he woke up, he was no longer on the beach.

influences_mood: The dinosaur built a sand castle, the dinosaur is proud of itself.
influences_eat: Lifting his head up, the dinosaur updated an unknown fruit. The dinosaur quickly ate this sweet fruit.
influences_game: The dinosaur saw the crabs playing with the ball and joined them.
influences_energy: Sunbathing on the beach, the dinosaur is ready to travel again!
coins: Collecting shells, the dinosaur saw something shiny, it turned out to be a coin.
item: Digging through the sand, the dinosaur suddenly stumbled upon a chest. Strongly hitting the castle, the dinosaur opened the chest and hid everything in his backpack.
quest: Walking along the beach, the dinosaur saw the dolphin washed ashore, the dinosaur helped him, and the dolphin gave him a reward.
battle: Aggressive animals appeared in the way of the dinosaur, they definitely wanted to do something bad with the dinosaur. The dinosaur waved its tail and there was no one left.

influences_mood: Walking along the beach, the dinosaur saw a dinosaur running from crabs on the other side. He felt sad, because sometimes cute creatures are dangerous.
influences_eat: The dinosaur was actively swimming in the water.
influences_game: The dinosaur was bored with the calm environment.
influences_energy: Running on the sand, the dinosaur forgot that he could get tired.
coins: Running and jumping, the dinosaur completely forgot about the backpack. The crabs wasted no time and stole a couple of coins.
item: Running and jumping, the dinosaur completely forgot about the backpack. Crabs wasted no time and dragged away important items of the dinosaur.
quest: Making his way through the vines, the dinosaur heard someone looking for friends to play ball. Running to the source of the sound, the dinosaur saw crocodiles in black, they demanded a ransom from the dinosaur.
battle: While walking, the dinosaur did not notice at all how he approached the "Dangerous Animals" base, he had to run away with his tail pinched.

without_influence: Walking among the sands, the dinosaur saw water, but quickly realized that it was a mirage.
influences_health: Traveling through the desert, the dinosaur discovered an unknown plant that grows alone among the sands. The dinosaur ate it...
meeting_friend: Among the sands, the dinosaur sees something bright white. It's {friend}! Dinosaurs are very happy with each other!
trade_item: A mysterious animal appeared on the way, he opens his bags and shows glitter, the dinosaur is interested in something...
edit_location: A storm rises, nothing can be seen, but here, the dinosaur clears the sand from his eyes, and he is no longer in the desert.

influences_mood: A light breeze blew, in such hot weather it is especially pleasant.
influences_eat: In such conditions, sometimes you want something exotic, like a cactus. The dinosaur liked it.
influences_game: Jumping on the sands like waves, the dinosaur imagines itself as a shark.
influences_energy: After relaxing in the shade under the palm tree, you can continue your journey.
coins: The winds unearthed the ancient village, walking through it, the dinosaur collected some coins.
item: On the way of the dinosaur is a giant structure - a pyramid, having studied it, the dinosaur found something interesting.
quest: Walking on the sands, the dinosaur notices an old tiger, who asks for some water. The dinosaur happily shared the water and received the award.
battle: The unprecedented heat turned the animals into monsters, they are ready to do anything for food. But dinosaurs are always ready to stand up for themselves.

influences_mood: The dinosaur feels lonely among these sands, he is sad.
influences_eat: There is only sand everywhere, there is nothing tasty, the dinosaur is hungry.
influences_game: Playing with sand is no longer so interesting, I want to play something more interesting.
influences_energy: It is very hard to walk in such heat, the dinosaur is tired.
coins: Suddenly a strong wind blew, the dinosaur's bag flew a couple of meters away from him. Picking it up, he couldn't find a pair of coins.
item: Suddenly, a strong wind blew, the dinosaur's bag flew away from him a couple of meters. The dinosaur picked it up and walked on, the bag became noticeably lighter.
quest: There is a fence ahead, it seems to stretch for hundreds of meters, in order not to go around, you need to pay.
battle: Aggressive animals stood in front of the dinosaur, the dinosaur did not want to tear, had to run away.

without_influence: The dinosaur saw snowflakes falling beautifully from the sky.
influences_health: The dinosaur performed a ritual of hardening the body, restoring his blood.
meeting_friend: Among the snowdrifts, the dinosaur sees something bright, this {friend}! Dinosaurs are happy to see each other!
trade_item: Walking along the path, the dinosaur meets a polar bear, who tells that he also travels and wants to exchange some goods.
edit_location: The dinosaur walked among the snows for so long that he fell asleep, opening his eyes, he was definitely not in the mountains.

influences_mood: The dinosaur made a snow angel in the snow, he really liked it.
influences_eat: Walking along the path, the dinosaur got a piece of cake on its head, it turned out to be very tasty.
influences_game: Running after snowflakes and knocking on the crystals, the dinosaur did not notice how a couple of hours passed.
influences_energy: The dinosaur lay down to rest in the cave, putting a stone under his head.
coins: Accidentally smashing one of the crystals, the dinosaur upgraded a couple of coins.
item: Digging through the snow, the dinosaur stumbled upon something solid, he decided to take this “something” with him.
quest: Walking along the path, the dinosaur met a hare. The hare said that he could not get his hat, which he left in a dark cave. The dinosaur went to the cave and very quickly found the hat with the help of a torch.
battle: Aggressive animals saw the dinosaur warming up by the fire and decided to take it away. But the dinosaur is not a coward, he stood up for himself and the fire.

influences_mood: The dinosaur soaked his feet in the snow, he's sad about it.
influences_eat: There is nothing edible among the rocks and caves, the dinosaur is hungry.
influences_game: There is a blizzard, the dinosaur has taken refuge in a cave, but there is nothing to play with.
influences_energy: It is very difficult to walk in the snow, the dinosaur is tired.
coins: Walking along the path, the dinosaur fell into a snowdrift, climbing out of it, he turned a couple of coins.
item: Walking along the path, the dinosaur fell into the snowdrift, climbing out of it, he turned something, but did not want to climb there again.
quest: Going out into the open, the dinosaur saw a wolf that was stuck under the snow, the dinosaur immediately tried to help. It turned out to be a trap and the dinosaur lost something from the backpack while running away.
battle: Running through the forest, the dinosaur did not even notice how he ran into the den of wild animals, so he had to run away.

without_influence: Walking through the magical forest, the dinosaur noticed how beautifully the leaves shimmer.
influences_health: Walking along the path, the dinosaur met a fairy who healed his wounds.
meeting_friend: Traveling through the magical forest, the dinosaur met his friend {friend}!
trade_item: Following the magical path, the dinosaur met a magical merchant. The dinosaur was very interested in his products.
edit_location: Turning in the wrong direction, the dinosaur went along a completely different path and came out of the magical forest.

influences_mood: Walking along the road, the dinosaur noticed the fairies playing with each other, the dinosaur was very amused.
influences_eat: After collecting the magic spices from the bushes and eating them, the dinosaur felt as if it was full of them.
influences_game: Walking along the path and looking behind the dervo, the dinosaur found a magical tennis championship there!
influences_energy: Sitting under a tree, the dinosaur suddenly noticed his strength returning to him!
coins: Intending to go the other way, the dinosaur suddenly noticed something glistening in the bushes, it turned out to be a couple of coins.
item: Passing by the tree, it seemed strange to the dinosaur that there were so many footprints around. After examining the area, the dinosaur found something interesting!
quest: Having received a task from the fairy, the dinosaur went in search of volgeb grass. When he returned, he received a reward!
battle: Evil animals from the neighboring forest were going to spoil the forest, but the dinosaur proudly stood on guard!

influences_mood: Walking, the dinosaur saw a felled tree, he was very upset because of this...
influences_eat: I am actively traveling, the dinosaur has gone cold.
influences_game: Walking through the monaton forest, the dinosaur is bored, he wants to play.
influences_energy: Climbing under each stone, the dinosaur was very tired and sat down to rest.
coins: Going through the items found, the dinosaur considered the square coin to be a fake and threw it away.
item: A hole formed in the dinosaur's backpack, because of this the dinosaur could have lost something.
quest: Walking, the dinosaur saw a crying dinosaur, coming up, the dinosaur could not make out his words. After digging in your pockets, your dinosaur offered to eat the poor man, but he just left.

book_forest:
An ancient and mighty forest with giant trees, so they say about this forest...
I, Fredrik Al Johnson, will check it out myself!
26.08.3--7 15:38: I just went into the forest, it looks like a forest, except for the huge trees!

26.08.3--7 19:12: I saw a beautiful sunset, went to look for a place to relax.

26.08.2--7 21:01: For the whole day I did not see any dangerous animals, only trees, trees, trees.

27.08.3--7 13:59: Crossed a stormy river, almost lost all his belongings.

27.08.3--7: I lost my watch somewhere, now I can't write time, but it's already getting dark.

27.08.3--7: I see in the distant light, I will try to get closer.
27.08.3--7: I can't believe my eyes, are they... Dinosaurs?! Are you sure I'm not crazy?
I write quickly, I think some of them felt me, I run away.

28.08 +- 2 days: I do not know how long I have been sitting here, someone is constantly walking over me, I have not replenished my water and food supplies for a long time, soon I will have to resurface. I'm not sure I can stand up to the DINOSAURS (YES THEY can!)
I'll leave it here, I hope I'll come back here.

edit_dino.info:
🧬 | *Dinosaur change*
_A dinosaur can be transformed into another. With the latest technology, you can change the appearance and genes of a dinosaur!_

🎍 | There are 3 ways to transform:

*🎭 Rarity* - Only the rarity of the dinosaur will change.

*🎠 Appearance* - Change in appearance. The rarity will remain the same, but the appearance will change in accordance with the rarity of the dinosaur.

*🎑 Full* - Change in both appearance and rarity of the dinosaur.

_As a result of mutations, your dinosaur's tastes may change._

string_to_str.info:
⚽ In some commands, it is convenient to specify the time not in chisol, but in text, here is a memo. 
 
 If you are sent here, then you can use the methods of entering the time by text. You can try it right here, write down `/string_to_sec` `1d` `1h` `12m` 
 You will receive 90720 in response - these are the numbers of seconds that are calculated from your message. 
 
 What symbols can be used? 
 `w` - Week, `d` - day, `h` - hour, `m` - minute, `s` - second (you can omit the letter) 
 
 _By the way, you can specify 1 and the same character as many times as you like and in any order._

promo.count: ☄ Enter the number of uses, 0 - infinitely
promo.time_end: 🎠 Enter the end time, 0 is infinite. `/seconds_to_str` - Don't forget about the memo.
